attributes.action: please stay on as leader and prime Minister to avoid certain deterioration of all you have achieved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair must stay on as leader and prime Minister, because without him, everything he has achieved over the last ten years will suffer. So Tony Blair has made mistakes, but then he is only human, and no one is perfect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
